channel.title: [Delta]Getting a random item from a strange box
channel.description:
Very simple. Here's what the results are: [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2afwmqh&s=6]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2afwmqh&s=6[/url]
In potions.java and add this anywhere. [code]case 3062: c.deleteItem(3062, c.getItemSlot(3062), 1); c.addItem(Item.randomr(), 1); break;[/code] ----------------- [code]case 3062:[/code] That's the item ID(strange box) [code]c.deleteItem(3062, c.getItemSlot(3062), 1);[/code] Deletes the item. [code]c.addItem(Item.randomr(), 1);[/code] Adds a item from randomr(you see what that means in a second. ---------------------------------------------------------------- in client.java UNDER this: [code]public class client extends Player implements Runnable {[/code] add this: [code]public void givereward() { if(playerHasItem(3062) && (freeSlots()>0)) { deleteItem(3062, 1); addItem(Item.randomr(), 1); } else sM("You need a free slot in your invertory."); }[/code] [code]public void givereward()[/code] The name of the void... [code]deleteItem(3062, 1);[/code] deletes the box [code]addItem(Item.randomr(), 1); adds 1 random item. [/code] Now in item.java OVER: [code]public static int Clue[/code] add: [code]public static int randomr[] = {391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 1917, 2460, 526, 440, 946, 590, 849, 861, 1117, 1027, 1029, 1031, 1019, 1021, 1023, 1169, 1149, 1319, 1540, 2389, 2651, 2641, 751, 968, 1141, 1245, 1357, 1609, 1625, 1729, 1757, 1779, 1923, 1305, 964, 1017, 1213, 1211, 3753, 4166, 4153, 6528, 2359, 6382, 1295, 1321, 1373, 1409, 1779, 2579, 3095, 3179, 3767, 3769, 3952, 4095, 4131, 4298, 4300, 4302, 4304, 4306, 3095, 6382, 995, 1923, 391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 4151, 6585 }; public static int randomr() {[/code] This will give you a random item each time you click on the box,add your own like this: [code]####, ####,[/code] (with #### being the item ID)

item.title: [Delta]Getting a random item from a strange box
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:45, topic:326892”]i got this error…

.\client.java:27: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomr()
location: class Item
addItem(Item.randomr(), 1);
^
.\potions.java:22: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomr()
location: class Item
c.addItem(Item.randomr(), 1);
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You don’t have the method randomr().

Here you go, this will explain everything.

http://www.roseindia.net/java/java-get-example/cannot-find-symbol.shtml

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta]Getting a random item from a strange box

item.title: [Delta]Getting a random item from a strange box
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:23, topic:326892”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=423297.msg3115907#msg3115907 date=1264963324]
wow, your variable naming sucks.
ps, If you have no java knowledge whatsoever the last code is wrong:
It should be:

public static int strangeBoxItems[] = {391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 1917, 2460, 526, 440, 946, 590, 849, 861, 1117, 1027, 1029, 1031, 1019, 1021, 1023, 1169, 1149, 1319, 1540, 2389, 2651, 2641, 751, 968, 1141, 1245, 1357, 1609, 1625, 1729, 1757, 1779, 1923, 1305, 964, 1017, 1213, 1211, 3753, 4166, 4153, 6528, 2359, 6382, 1295, 1321, 1373, 1409, 1779, 2579, 3095, 3179, 3767, 3769, 3952, 4095, 4131, 4298, 4300, 4302, 4304, 4306, 3095, 6382, 995, 1923, 391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 4151, 6585 };
  public static int randomr() {
           return strangeBoxItems[(int)Math.random*strangeBoxItems];
  }

[/quote]

Yours is wrong as well.

return strangeBoxItems[(int)Math.random*strangeBoxItems.length];[/quote]Yours is wrong as well.

return strangeBoxItems[(int)(Math.random()*strangeBoxItems.length];

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Getting a random item from a strange box
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:23, topic:326892”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=423297.msg3115907#msg3115907 date=1264963324]
wow, your variable naming sucks.
ps, If you have no java knowledge whatsoever the last code is wrong:
It should be:

public static int strangeBoxItems[] = {391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 1917, 2460, 526, 440, 946, 590, 849, 861, 1117, 1027, 1029, 1031, 1019, 1021, 1023, 1169, 1149, 1319, 1540, 2389, 2651, 2641, 751, 968, 1141, 1245, 1357, 1609, 1625, 1729, 1757, 1779, 1923, 1305, 964, 1017, 1213, 1211, 3753, 4166, 4153, 6528, 2359, 6382, 1295, 1321, 1373, 1409, 1779, 2579, 3095, 3179, 3767, 3769, 3952, 4095, 4131, 4298, 4300, 4302, 4304, 4306, 3095, 6382, 995, 1923, 391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 391, 1331, 1333, 6571, 6573, 1623, 1607, 1773, 1727, 385, 5295, 1965, 5698, 4151, 6585 };
  public static int randomr() {
           return strangeBoxItems[(int)Math.random*strangeBoxItems];
  }

[/quote]

Yours is wrong as well.

return strangeBoxItems[(int)Math.random*strangeBoxItems.length];

I rushed it! Next time I ever post a snippet I will read over so you don’t have to correct me every time.

ps, now I know how most people feel when programming in notepad; ie you are never notified if you make a small mistake.

Read full topic
